title: casioBeats
description: Experiment with this soundboard and see what you discover.

title: Text2Speech
description: Utilizing google translate, anyone can write a message in their own language and hear it vocalized.

title: Clock
description: A real-time analog clock, rendered digitally (but still analog!).

title: Activ8
description: Aids the user in taking action. Sign a petition, go to an event, or donate to a charity related to your passion.

title: Canvas
description: An MSPaint-inspired interactive canvas for multi-colored drawing.

title: Clicky: The Next Generation
description: The anti-matching game. Click as many non-duplicate Star Trek characters as possible.

title: Fore!Cast
description: User can create events, check the weather, and move the event to a day with better weather.

title: Webcam
description: A video photobooth that lets the user take selfies.

title: Whack!
description: Hit as many gophers as possible before time runs out!
